about: A seasoned Front end Developer with over 4 years of experience across consulting, health-tech, and logistics sectors. I am proficient in both Angular and React. My development experience includes building e-commerce platforms, company-specific dashboards, and APIs that power mobile applications.  My core programming languages are Typescript and JavaScript. I am Known for my collaboration skills and team-oriented mindset, I am always eager to learn and continuously enhance my technical expertise.

projects.title: Twikkie
projects.info: Twikkie is a human resource management web application. It manages employees, departments, leaves, attendance, payroll, and more.

projects.title: Safe sky
projects.info: Safe sky is an enterprise administrative web application used to manage flights from departure to arrival. It provides both quick and detail overview including graphical analytics of all operations. It provides real time flight details, drag and drop, creating new flight strips with on screen keyboard
projects.techStack: Angular | Tailwind  | Angular Material | Netlify | AWS | Typescript

projects.title: Workstarplace
projects.info: This project is Workstarplace goto website to find out all information about who they are and what they do.

projects.title: Netflix clone
projects.info: This project is a clone of netflix website powered by IMDB api and youtube. It is a work in progress but you can get all the latest movies and tv shows
projects.techStack: Angular | Tailwindcss | Nodejs | javascript | IMDB | Typescript

projects.title: Smart Clinic
projects.info: Smart clinic is an hospital management web application. It manages doctors,nurses, staffs,patients,appointments,consultations,payments,clinics,pharmacy etc
projects.techStack: Angular | Angular Material | nodejs | Mongodb | AWS | Typescript
